_header: Hail our lode star both bright and clear
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: James Ryman, ‘Salue regina glorie / Mater misericordie’ — twelve quatrains (abab) with this burden

CULEe112.First Lines:
Hayle oure lod sterre bothe bright & clereHayle welle of grace
                    and of pitee…
